name: Cool People Club Demo
description:
HOWDY

This page contains a free demo of my game, Cool People Club.  The full version can be purchased here on Itch.io, or on Steam.

STORY

Plate, Duck, and Sock come across a Cool Contest - a contest in which the winner is granted a wish. However, the winner of this contest is determined by combat, and our heroes might just be in over their heads. Are you cool enough to lead them to victory?

FEATURES

  • Play as 3 different characters, each with their own attacks & quirks.
  • Encounter many foes with unique attacks, projectiles, and styles.
  • Fight powerful bosses.
  • Earn cool badges.
  • Choose your fate...
